InboundVoiceStep.description: Initial component for the inbound voice, must as the first step in the flow.

IncomingMessageStep.description: Initial component for the incoming message, must as the first step in the flow.

priority.description: Define the priority for this assignment request.

time_limit.description: Maximum time to find the configured assignment.

AssignmentAndDialStep.description: A component related to assigning and dialing

HangupCallStep.description: A component for terminating calls or message

record_parameters.description: Transcribe or not with Max duration in seconds.

VoicemailStep.description: A component for managing voicemail functionalities

message.title: Play audio message
message.description: Configure the audio message the user will hear.

timeout.title: Time in seconds
timeout.description: Integer indicating in seconds for how long we will wait for the input. It resets as new digits are input

oneOf.description: If an invalid key is pressed

oneOf.title: Custom Exits
oneOf.description: Exit that the component will use if the condition is evaluated to true

StandardIVRStep.description: A component for Allows a contact to input data via the dial pad

SalesforceDataDipStep.description: Search your organization's Salesforce data for specific information using Salesforce Object Query Language (SOQL).

anyOf.description: If none of the rules match

oneOf.title: Time based exits

ranges.description: Ordered set of time ranges to test against

inside_business_hours.title: Time range
inside_business_hours.description: whether this rule is interpreted as being inside business hours

oneOf.description: Define exits based on week days and time ranges

TimeBasedRulesStep.description: A component for Route based on time of day and day of the week

anyOf.description: If none of the rules match

oneOf.title: Custom Exits

dates.description: Ordered set of calendar ranges to test against

oneOf.description: Define exits based on calendar rules

CalendarBasedRuleStep.description: A component for Route based on days of the year

allOf.description: If the interaction was handled by the virtual agent and ended successfully
If there is a request for the interaction to be escalated to a human agent
If an unexpected error occurs with the virtual agent

anyOf.description: If no expression evaluates to true

oneOf.title: Custom Exits
oneOf.description: Configure the conditions that will be used to direct the interaction to specific exits

ConditionalStep.description: This component evaluates expressions defined in it and returns the outcome of the first expression that yields true

text_message_info.title: Compose message
text_message_info.description: Configure the automated text message that will appear for the user

AutomatedMessageStep.description: A component for configure the automated text message that will appear for the user

priority.description: Define the priority for this assignment request.

time_limit.description: Maximum time to find the configured assignment.

allOf.description: If a match could not be found
If there was a successful match and a conversation with an agent has started
If there was a match but all agents are busy and the configured time out was reached
If there was at least one successful offer attempt but no agent was available

AssignChatWithCapacityStep.description: A component related to assigning a chat
